attributes.action: Stop businesses refusing cash and only taking card payments
attributes.additional_details:
Moving toward a 'card only' completely removes people's freedom. Children and Adults receive cash as a gift, children especially are affected as they will be unable to use their cash to buy themselves a gift from a amusement park for example.

Cash is one of the most secure forms of payment, once handed over unless enforced by law, cannot be retrieved back, a card payment can be 'charged back' without much restriction making businesses potentially offer a service without receiving payment.
attributes.background: High street retailers, holiday resorts, amusement parks have stopped accepting cash and will only accept a form of card payment. Cash is legal tender and refusing cash people's freedom in how they want to pay for goods or services

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588814
